10-24-2008, 05:22 PM #1 Smokymist View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles 1/2007 Join Date Mar 2005 Location East Tennessee Posts 1,872 Blockbuster - anyone have a contact number ? Sorry if this is in the wrong place. I quit my Netflix membership two weeks ago because I could never get a movie, and started Blockbuster. Well I've rented 5 movies, and alot of the ones I really wanted. I noticed in my 'queue' today that Baby Mama wasn't showing as returned. I returned it at the store. So I emailed them, and they replied back that it was not showing as scanned OR returned. So I call the store, and the manager there says when they scan a movie in, it doesnt' show which movie . So I said...I can point out to you the guy who took this movie from me, and the manager just said to have Blockbuster call him. I'd like to Call blockbuster to speak to an actual person, because it took them over 24 hours to reach me the first time and I want to get this cleared up. And now I'm worried because what the heck proof do I have that I returned this movie if the people at my blockbuster store didn't even do their job and scan it in ??? Anyway, does anyone have a contact number ? Reply With Quote 10-24-2008, 05:32 PM #2 jovigirl1228 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Oct 2007 Posts 12 customer care # is 1 800 406 6843 online is 18666922789 i believe i work at blockbuster did you try to report a problem with that movie in your queue if you havent go in your queue click on report a problem and one of the options should be i have returned the movie but it has not cleared my queue if you have already done that or it doesn't work definitely give them a call Reply With Quote 10-24-2008, 05:45 PM #3 katland View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Oct 2006 Posts 16,912 from the Better Business Bureau's website, this is their headquarters info:
Name: Blockbuster, Inc Phone: (866) 692-2789 Address: 1201 Elm St Dallas, TX 75270-2002 Website: www.blockbuster.com Original Business Start Date: October 1985 Principal: Mr. James Keyes, CEO Customer Contact: Ms. Sonte Crittenden, Manager
Or, go to www.search.bbb.org and search on the business name Blockbuster - there will be other results, and some have many, many phone numbers for you to try. Reply With Quote 10-24-2008, 05:50 PM #4 Godspoet View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Dec 2004 Location In my little world....shhhh.... Posts 5,833 Why not go into the store in person? I had this happen before&went into the store&took the movie that I returned off the shelf to prove to them that they had it. They said sometimes the scanner doesn't scan them in if they do it too fast....like right?! I know if it was a New release that may be hard to do since sometimes they have like 50 copies, but in person usually works. Hope you get it worked out, I know it's aggravating to say the least!
Also if it's been checked out since you returned it, then obviously they got it from you. I would ask. Last edited by Godspoet; 10-24-2008 at 05:51 PM . Reply With Quote 10-24-2008, 07:17 PM #5 Smokymist View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles 1/2007 Join Date Mar 2005 Location East Tennessee Posts 1,872 I will try that tomorrow, but I dont' see how it would make a difference. I spoke to a man on the phone. He looked up my account and told me that they do not have a record of the 'names' of the movies that are checked back in, just a number. So he had no idea which movies I had returned And it is a newer release, so to pick up a copy of one they have ..probably wouldn't matter as they have many. Thank you for looking that up Katland Reply With Quote 10-25-2008, 04:51 AM #6 bufflobreath View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2005 Posts 24 Today when I got home there was a phone message that I did not send back the movie that I rented, I called spoke with a manager and he said it was on the shelf and he was sorry. The other post said the same thing try calling a manager and ask them to check the shelf. Hope this helps. Reply With Quote
